text: Malone is an unincorporated community in Clinton County, in the U.S. state of Iowa. ==History== Malone was originally called Ramessa, but after a fire, the railroad station was moved and renamed Malone, after Malone, New York. A post office was established as Ramessa in 1857, renamed Malone in 1867; the post office was discontinued in 1922. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Clinton County, Iowa Category:1857 establishments in Iowa Category:Populated places established in 1857 Category:Unincorporated communities in Iowa
title: Malone, Iowa
